segments.text: I notice the open window letting in some fresh air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden beyond looks well-kept with bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman's drying dishes so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing, water cascading over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, one foot in the puddle without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the cabinet doors are swung open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is stretched up on a stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks thrilled to be sneaking those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, unstable as can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her arm raised, palm up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're teaming up for this little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad that the mom might miss this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage could be bad if no one stops it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mix of calm and trouble in one room.
segments.speaker: PAR
